title: Chilli beefburgers
ingredients: ['900g (2 lb) minced beef', '2 cloves garlic, minced', '2 green chillies, seeded and minced', '1 small poblano chilli, seeded and minced (optional)', '1 fresh habanero pepper, seeded and minced (optional)', '1 teaspoon cayenne pepper', 'handful chopped fresh coriander', '1 teaspoon ground cumin']
